snippet: Few people in Egypt have seen “The Square,” an Oscar-nominated documentary about the Arab Spring uprising there, but those who have are mostly unhappy about it.
abstract: Many Egyptians vigorously complain about omissions or distortions in Oscar-nominated documentary The Square, which looks at the Arab Spring uprising in Egypt through the eyes of a handful of young rebels.

byline.original: By DAVID D. KIRKPATRICK and MAYY EL SHEIKH

lead_paragraph: Few people in Egypt have seen “The Square,” an Oscar-nominated documentary about the Arab Spring uprising there, but those who have are mostly unhappy about it.

headline.seo: Egyptian-American Filmmaker Captures Cairo’s Arab Spring
headline.main: Once Upon a Revolution: A Story With No End
headline.print_headline: Once Upon a Revolution: A Story With No End

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
